item.title: SPECIAL LEGAL UPDATE: Canada's Corrupt Legal System Comes for Convictional Christians ft. James S.M. Kitchen [Open Mike with Michael Thiessen]
item.description:
OPEN MIKE w/Michael Thiessen [LEGAL SPECIAL] ~ June 17, 2023

This week on OPEN MIKE, Dr. Thiessen is joined by LCC chief litigator James S.M. Kitchen to update listeners on LCC's latest legal battles.

Episode Resource: CCOA v. Dr. Curtis Wall: https://libertycoalitioncanada.com/liberty-defense-fund/college-of-chiropractors-of-alberta-v-dr-curtis-wall/;
Wanh Porter v. North York General Hospital: https://libertycoalitioncanada.com/liberty-defense-fund/wahn-porter-v-north-york-general-hospital/;

JOIN PASTORS, CHURCHES, AND CHRISTIAN COMMUNITIES ACROSS CANADA WITH LCC'S NEWEST INITIATIVE, "TRUE READINGS FROM TRUE ROYALTY."

item.title: Joint Response to CBC Hit-Piece ft. Dr. Aaron Rock, Dr. Joseph Boot and Ryan Eras of the Ezra Institute [Open Mike with Michael Thiessen]
item.description:
OPEN MIKE w/Michael Thiessen ~ June 10, 2023
On this episode of Open Mike, Dr. Thiessen is joined by Dr. Aaron Rock of Harvest Bible Church in Windsor, Ontario, and the Ezra Institute's Dr. Joseph Boot and Ryan Eras to talk about the under-handed bias of the recent CBC article about them and their institutions.

CBC Article: https://www.cbc.ca/news/investigates/fundamentalist-christian-movement-1.6793677;
CBC Podcast: https://open.spotify.com/episode/0BvkvWpUodv3wUfjvbxrOE?si=a3d11da3f0af43a8;

Episode Resource: Harvest Windsor Bible Church: https://harvestwindsor.ca/;
Leadership Now Podcast: https://harvestwindsor.ca/leadershipnow/; Ezra Institute: https://www.ezrainstitute.com/;
Get Joe's Lastest Book - Ruler of Kings: https://ezrapress.ca/products/ruler-of-kings-toward-a-christian-vision-of-government;

Interested in reading the "spooky" Niagara Declaration: https://www.niagaradeclaration.ca/

item.title: Biblical Manhood ft. Pastor Michael Foster [Open Mike with Michael Thiessen]
item.description:
OPEN MIKE w/Michael Thiessen ~ June 02, 2023
On this episode of Open Mike, Dr. Thiessen is joined by Michael Foster, Pastor at East River Church and author of It's Good to Be a Man, to talk about biblical manhood and what it means in an androgynous age. 

Episode Resource: It's Good to Be a Man Website: https://itsgoodtobeaman.com/; It's Good to Be a Man Book: https://book.itsgoodtobeaman.com/; Michael's Twitter Page: https://twitter.com/thisisfoster; East River Church: https://eastriverchurch.org/.
